duties_responsibilities.duty: Evaluate, diagnose, and treat new and established psychiatric patients in the outpatient setting (in person and telemedicine opportunities)
Create and implement treatment plans for patients
Provide compassionate and conscientious care to patients and families
Work collaboratively with providers to provide comprehensive care and make referrals when necessary
Communicate effectively with patients, families, and other healthcare providers

education_certification.credential: Board certified/Board eligible in Psychiatry and/or Child and Adolescent Psychiatry
Licensed by the Texas Medical Board
Current DEA certificate (Texas)- or in progress
